description: This is better off being used as fuel in a furnace. You should give this one to your least favorite player!
The basic usable weapon for combat. Help your favorite player triumph in battle!
An upgraded sword for combat. Help your favorite player triumph in battle!
One of the best swords for combat. Help your favorite player triumph in battle with style!
This is the best of the best, they'll do lots of damage with this one. Help your favorite player triumph in battle with style!
Minecraft's signature ranged weapon. Can take out foes at a distance! (comes with 20 arrows)
Minecraft's *NEW* signature ranged weapon. Can take out foes at a distance! (comes with 20 arrows)
